Type.Name: FileNotFoundException

TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit FileNotFoundException extends System.IO.IOException

Type.ThreadingSafetyStatement: All public static members of this type are safe for multithreaded operations. No instance members are guaranteed to be thread safe.

summary.para: Represents the error that occurs when a file path argument specifies a file that does not exist.

example.para: The following example demonstrates an error that causes the exception to be thrown.

summary.para: Constructs and initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.para: This constructor initializes the property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error, such as "Could not find the specified file." This message takes into account the current system culture.
The and properties of the new instance are initialized to .

summary.para: Gets the error message that explains the reason for the exception.

value.para: A containing the error message. This string includes the if a value for that property was supplied to the constructor for the current instance.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual string ToString()
public override string ToString ();
.method public hidebysig virtual instance string ToString() cil managed

summary.para: Returns a representation of the current instance.

returns.para: A representation of the current Exception.

remarks.para: The string representation returned by this method includes the fully qualified name of the current Exception, the message, the result of calling on the inner Exception, the file name, and the result of calling . Null values are omitted from the returned string.

example.para: The following example causes a exception and displays the result of calling on that Exception.
example.code: Caught: System.IO.FileNotFoundException: Could not find file "/Eccma/examples/FileTest.cs". File name: "/Eccma/examples/FileTest.cs" at System.IO.__Error.WinIOError(Int32 errorCode, String str) at System.IO.File.InternalCopy(String sourceFileName, String destFileName, Boolean overwrite) at FileNotFoundExample.Main()
